title: KKR Looks for Around $2 Billion for Portfolio Company Internet Brands
sub_head: The firm began pitching the deal to secondary investors this week, people familiar with the matter say
body:
KKR & Co. is seeking to raise roughly $2 billion for a secondary single-asset deal that would give the asset manager more capital and time to support portfolio company Internet Brands.
The firm began pitching the transaction to secondary investors this week, according to people familiar with the matter. Financial advisory firm Lazard Ltd. is advising KKR on the deal, the people said.
KKR...
